question: Do I need the implementation package?
answer: No. The implementation package is a one-time fee that ensures you get the most value from Sanctum right from the start by allowing us to set you up with a workspace, migrate your game content, and provide one-on-one training. This is beneficial for a designer or studio who is new to Sanctum with an existing game system or portfolio.

question: Can I change plans later?
answer: Yes! You can upgrade, downgrade, or switch between monthly and annual billing at any time. Your costs will be prorated accordingly.

question: What happens after my trial?
answer: You'll only be billed after your 14-day trial if you choose to continue. We'll send a reminder before your trial ends, and you can cancel anytime.

question: Do you offer discounts for non-profit organizations?
answer: Yes! Contact our team to learn about our non-profit program and special pricing.

question: Do you support Enterprise plans?
answer: No. Today, we focus on helping indie publishers and mid-sized teams.
